## Checklist

- [ ] `cargo fmt --all` passes
- [ ] `cargo clippy --workspace` passes
- [ ] `cargo test --workspace` passes
- [ ] No `.unwrap()` or `.expect()` in production code
- [ ] No secret values logged

- [ ] Tests added for new functionality
